EmailTemplate.name: Experience Classic Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to ETAP Customer Portal - Your Account is Ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer,
We're excited to welcome you to ETAP Customer Portal! Your account has been successfully created, giving you access to our self-service platform.
Here's what you need to know to get started:
1. First-Time Login: - Visit this link : Define your password , and enter this username : {!Receiving_User.Username} - You'll be prompted to define a password.
2. Already a customer and you want to reset your password : - Visit this link : Reset your password , and enter this username : {!Receiving_User.Username} - You'll be prompted to create a new password.
3. Key Features: - View and manage your account asset details. - Access our knowledge base for quick answers. - Submit and track support cases.
4. Need Help? If you have any questions or need assistance, please: - Check our FAQ section in the portal - Contact our support team at support@bim-electric.com
Security Tip: Please ensure you change your password upon your first login and keep your login information secure.
We're committed to providing you with the best possible experience. Your feedback is valuable to us, so please don't hesitate to reach out with any suggestions or concerns.
Welcome aboard, and we look forward to serving you through our Customer Portal!
Best regards,
